import React from 'react' import { GiDirectionSign } from 'react-icons/gi' import { Card, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' export default class ParkCard extends React.PureComponent { render() { const img = this.props.park.park_images[Math.floor(Math.random() * this.props.park.park_images.length)] return (
this.props.showPark(this.props.park)} style={{ maxHeight: '35rem', borderRadius: "10px" }} src={img.url} alt={img.caption} />

{this.props.park.name}

) } }
